titleInfo.title: Prairie Ramblers - WLS performances - 1941-02-06 // Radio Rogues routine

mods.abstract: Home recorded Prairie Ramblers performances, as performed on February 6, 1941 on radio station WLS (Chicago, IL). Followed by a performance of Two Hearts That Pass In The Night by an unknown performer and a Radio Rogues comedy routine.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
